sentence: It is similar in shape to the Ancient Greek letter alpha from which it derives
The lowercase version can be written in two forms the doublestorey a and singlestorey ɑ
In Latvian Romanian and Livonian the comma diacritic appears below the letter as in ș
For the notation ⟨x⟩ and x used in this article see grapheme and phoneme respectively
It is also used in a few distinctive cases for the marking of plurals e
